Question & Options:
What accolades did *Slumdog Millionaire* receive in contrast to *Taare Zameen Par*?
Options:
A. A) It was not nominated for any awards
B. B) It received multiple Academy Award nominations and wins
C. C) It was included in the Academy Award shortlist
D. D) It was directed by Aamir Khan
Correct Answer: B) It received multiple Academy Award nominations and wins

Question & Options:
Which film received multiple Academy Award nominations and wins, unlike *Taare Zameen Par*?
Options:
A. The Pursuit of Happyness
B. Slumdog Millionaire
C. Life of Pi
D. The King's Speech

What achievement is associated with *Slumdog Millionaire* in contrast to *Taare Zameen Par*?
Options:
A. Best Original Score
B. Multiple Academy Award nominations and wins
C. Best Cinematography
D. Best International Feature Film
Correct Answer: Multiple Academy Award nominations and wins
